issue.title: Product feedback Thomas 2018/8/30
issue.body:
Product walkthrough with Thomas (@homtec) on Zoom:

- Choose Templates
  - Add one sentence explaining what the boxes and templates do
  - Check which templates/boxes need additional solidity and js files to make every template and box work out of the box

- Console screen
  - Solium outputs too many newlines to keep it readable
  - Echo the commands being executed in console
  - Integrate Ganache API/JSONRPC to show Ganache output
  - Edge case: migrate --hardreset is sometimes needed. (Perhaps when Ganache is reset, Truffle only uploads the change custom contract, but no the OpenZeppelin template?)

- Edit window
  - Open Ganache when editor starts
  - Interact and show contract vars and info after deploying the contract (like ethereum wallet does)
  - Etherscan links (and auto upload and share to gist for Etherscan)
  - Add target drop down in title bar (e.g. Ganach, Rinkeby, Main net)

- Long term ideas:
  - Hardware key (Ledger/Trezor) mainnet support and bypassing Metamask

- General:
  - Open source the repo now, add disclaimer it is nowhere near production ready.
  - @homtec will explore and set up project software (Asana, Github Project, etc)
